product_name: ENO HotSpot Hammock Sleeping Pad Wings
long_description: Sleeping pads tend to slip around in hammocks. ENO HotSpot(TM) Hammock sleeping pad wings solve the problem while also adding a bit more insulation. Slip the wings and stretchy panels over your sleeping pad (sold separately) and then place the pad in your hammock (sold separately). 6mm-thick closed-cell foam wings wrap comfortably around your sides and add insulation to keep you warm. HotSpot will fit into any ENO hammock and is designed to accommodate 20-in.-wide sleeping pads.
short_description: Sleeping pads tend to slip around in hammocks. ENO HotSpot(TM) Hammock sleeping pad wings solve the problem while also adding a bit more insulation.
